testsuite.name: LocationProvider Tests

testcase.name: Should throw LocationException when satellites are in invalid configuration
[1] distances=null, expectedMessage=Se requieren distancias de 3 satélites.
[2] distances=[], expectedMessage=Se requieren distancias de 3 satélites.
[3] distances=[100.0, 115.5], expectedMessage=Se requieren distancias de 3 satélites.
[4] distances=[100.0, 115.5, 142.7, 200.0], expectedMessage=Se requieren distancias de 3 satélites.
Should calculate consistent results for same input
Should calculate correct location with valid distances
